name: Ortelius's Map of England and Wales (1573)
description: Abraham Ortelius's map of England and Wales from the Theatrum Orbis Terrarum (1570+). 'Angliae, Scotiae, et Hiberniae, sive Britannicar: Insularum Descriptio'.
notes:
Abraham Ortelius (1527-1598), Theatrum Orbis Terrarum (first modern atlas, 1570).
England/Wales map added in later editions.
Based on Humphrey Lhuyd's map of England and Wales.
Widely available in digitized form.
NLS may have copies in their atlas collections.
